name: Stoneman's Adventure
description:
Stoneman’s Adventure is a 3d puzzle game whose gameplay is an unique combination of sokoban and one-line drawing. Embark on an adventure as a stoneman on an island filled with puzzles and secrets.


Generate stones, push stones, build shapes!


Features:
  • Introduces progressively advancing game mechanics
  • Handcrafted intricate puzzles
  • Streamlined gameplay progression
  • Expansive map breaking the barrier between levels
  • Relaxing and beautiful game soundtrack
  • Adorable ducks included.

Recommended configuration: Windows & keyboard and mouse
